reviews.review: 멀미가 난다구요? 정상입니다. 멀미 참아가며 하면 됍니다! 플탐이 짧긴 한데 말해뭐해 명작인데 가볍게 할 수 있어서 좋은것도 있어유

2.8h通关，顺便打了俩挑战关。
太经典了，就不多评价了

对比2代，1代关卡有点短，但引导非常好，基本上没迷过路，
另外传送门的方向问题比较明显，反复进出传送门的视角修正可能导致头晕，
别的没什么了。

另外就是导弹发射器的机制就用了2次（3次？），有点可惜。

Very good game, but personally I love the second game more by a tiny microscopic bit, mostly because of Wheatley lol!

The puzzles and game play are amazing in my opinion, finding the rattman shelters are so fun and the atmosphere is so well done, I can honestly say that I'm going to replay this over and over lmao, guess you could say I'll be thinking with portals.

포탈이라는 개성넘치는 기믹을 활용하는 신박한 퍼즐
자신들이 만든 기믹으로 난이도 있는 퍼즐을 자랑하는 게임
게임 자체는 길지 않지만 어려운 난이도의 맵들을 주어 머리 쓰게 하고 그걸 하다보면 플탐이 금방 길어지는 게임
살면서 한번쯤은 해봐야하는 게임

[h1 ]A GAME WITH GREAT PRICE AND GAMEPLAY [/h1]
This is one of the game that I fully enjoy it. With interesting and smart puzzles, you will feel mind-blown after solving them. Having a mysterious plot, the game brings you to a lonely environment and guide you to learn the fundamentals through the map design.  Eventually you will experience a sci-fi story with a [i] PLOT TWIST[/i].

I think the marked price is fair, but I picked up the game when there was the Lunar New Year discount.
Amazing puzzle game with a great antagonist that you love to...love.  I recommend this to everyone. Classic.
un jeux fantastique, il pousse a la réflexion et même si le "mode histoire" est cour il donne une liberté et de nombreux défis réalisable. c'est toujours un plaisir de passer du temps dessus.
I put a cube into an incinerator and it had an emotional impact on me

This was a triumph
I'm making a note here; "Huge success"

My satisfaction
Aperture Science:

Because we can

And threw every piece into a fire

Make a beautiful line

When I look out there,

On the people who are
Still alive

Still alive

Still alive
I feel fantastic and I'm
Still alive

Still alive

Still alive
Still alive

Эх... Портал... Игра которая в свои годы взорвала интернет и геймеров(не в буквальном смысле). Не могу сказать что то особенного, но это игра по слова родов в то время была прорывной... Он такой щас и есть если не считать что мой ноут держит ее на максах(без сглаживания) на 30-45 фпс(поверьте для меня это много, 100 фпс для меня это просто в мечтах)
A classic. Despite being short, so fun to replay, and much to find.
you've heard about it now buy it
I got the bundle when it was 3$, interesting series would recommend. only when the bundle is on sale tho.

Portal is my favourite series of games. I personally love the lonely ambience the game has, it's just you and the puzzle, nothing in between, maybe a little comment from GLaDOS, but that's it. It goes fenomenally well with the clinical and sterile look of the game. The puzzles are extremelly well made, I apreciated it a lot more after completing the game again with developer commentary on. Even though I've completed the game several times I still boot it up from time to time and I complete it, which is one of the advantages of it being so short. If you haven't played yet, do it, most of the time you can get both games for less than 3 euros so I can't find any excuse not to play both.
literally such a classic, i played it over 10 years after its release and its still so good
When u beat it you feel like a an actual god

Amazing game, don't know how I've missed out on it all this time. Even though it's old it is worth whatever they are charging. Great puzzles, amazing atmosphere. I wouldn't call it horror but the whole vibe is very uncomfortable. I'm sure you've heard this all before. Buy it now!

Jeu excellent.
à faire si ce n'est pas déjà fait.
Vraiment ça vaut le détour.
Même si vous avait un QI inférieur à 20.
C'est un jeu culte.

Do not buy if you want to play this game on Linux. I was having issues with performace. 
Maybe portal 2 is gonna run a lot better.

O jogo é muito bom, mas a jogabilidade desse jogo é horrível, se você quer um jogo para se divertir, procure outro, com esse jogo você vai passar muita raiva, inclusive nos mapas avançados, a câmera do jogo trava quando passa por um portal, o que impossibilita você ser rápido.
Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei, certamente está no top 10.

This game even though it's old, it's one of the most coolest games made by valve. Even thought it's a puzzle game it sticks out from the rest with it's interesting story

steam本家v社出品，可谓精品
很棒的解密游戏。
剧情前期比较平淡，但不时有GLaDos和你叨两句，还有几处小彩蛋，也不失趣味。
07年的游戏画质仍不俗，配置要求也不高。
"The cake is a lie"的发源地。
总之，经典之作，推荐入手。
（但可能有晕3D的情况）
最后，贴一个关于结局官方给出的漫画https://www.thinkwithportals.com/comic/?l=zh-cn
Купил по скидке. Хоть она и короткая но очень классная.

Anyway, this cake is great.
It's so delicious and moist.

If you like complicated mysteries with a little horrorfying aspect then this is the perfect game for you. It actually gets pretty difficult at the end and if that isn't enough, there are in total six bonus stages which add more difficulty to some of the levels from the story. All in all a well fleshed out game with a well designed gimmic.

Good job Valve!
